content.detailedDescription: I was travelling with my family on i-96 headed westbound outside lansing, mi when i observed two lights in the sky blinking.  at first, i thought it may have been an aircraft, however as we got closer, i realized that the wingspan and outline of the ufo was larger than that of a jetliner.  it was long and oval in shape and had only two lights.  its altitude was no more than 3,000 feet and there was no noise coming from it.  there were no nearby airports (the nearest airport, capital city international airport in lansing, was 15-20 miles away).  the ufo hovered over the interstate for a few seconds and then quickly moved over a field on the side of the highway.  after approximately 15 seconds, i looked back and it was gone.  the entire sighting lasted only 30 seconds.  it should be noted that the sky was clear and the weather was fair.  visibility was greater than 10 miles and traffic on the highway was light.
content.summary: Spotted ufo while travelling on i-96 outside lansing, mi.

content.detailedDescription: My sister has a game cam set up to take pictures of a bird feeder. the camera is set on motion sensor.  in viewing the thousands of pictures that were taken, she noticed that a picture on feb. 24 had captured what looked like a ufo.  looking at more pictures revealed 3 more pictures on feb. 28 of this ufo. the pictures are my sister's and you would need her permission to use them.  she has posted some pictures on facebook asking for identification of the object.  i am attaching the pictures for your evaluation if further investigation is warranted.
content.summary: 4 pictures on game camera

content.detailedDescription: We were heading home from my partners place,driving down highway 11.Then the passenger beside me said look at that bright star,then i told her oh that's my mother,i named the brightest star after her.Then i said no look it's the top of the tower its lined rate up with the tower on top.Then all of a sudden it starts moving away from the tower in a zigzag pattern,and it looked like it was gliding, floating, hovering up there in the sky.I said what the [item moved/cms/nd], is that my eyes or what and my passenger says no my girl i see it to.Then this big bright reddish light bright's up rate around it and it would go back to a dim light and this repeated a couple of times as we were looking at it,it looked like it was just floating,hovering up there and it was doing the bright light thing again.My passenger says oh my god i'm scared i told her so am i,i was shaking and my heart was pounding. so i grabbed my phone and took a couple pictures of it and posted a status on facebook saying oh my god go look in the sky rate now there's something weird up there. after i pressed the send button i looked back up at it,and that's when it zoomed away like so fast.. so fast like lighting.So after it disappears i still couldn't believe what i've just seen,i had this weird scared feeling i was even starting to think what if they know we saw them or what if they knew i took pics of it.That's why i didn't use flash on my camera,but any ways i still felt real  scared afterwards.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A friend and i were driving back home on highway 11,and all of a sudden this big bright light appears in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Before i ask my question, please read what happened to me:  in 1986,  i had an encounter of the 3rd kind with an attempted alien abduction, and i have a question of curiosity for those of you who have either been abducted or implanted. i was in bed asleep when i was awakened by bright light and the sound of voices coming from the living room.  i just thought it was my husband and his friends in the livingroom and noticing the clock which showed it was after 2am, i turned over in bed and was surprised to see my husband was asleep in bed next to me.  suddenly, i felt the evil presence of several people enter the bedroom and surround the bed.   i shut my eyes tight in terror and felt totally paralyzed.  although my eyes were shut, somehow  i could see 8 very tall beings dressed in white with big heads standing all around the bed and emanating a powerful evil.  i tried to pray, but all my mind could do was say, "jesus!  jesus!  jesus!"  they suddenly left, the light was suddenly gone, and i immediately shook my husband to wake him up and told him there were people in the house. he was terrified stiff and said, "i know, there were  8 of them and they were surrounding the bed and they were crushing my chest; i couldn't breathe and i couldn't move."  during the following days, my husband's sleeping behavior involved him thrashing his arms so violently during his sleep that i had to sleep in the spare bedroom for safety, especially since i was pregnant.  there were two subsequent "visitations" that occurred while i was sleeping in the spare bedroom; the evil beings came into my bedroom before going into my husband's bedroom.  again, all i could do was pray in my mind, "jesus!  jesus!  jesus!" and the beings left and my husband again confirmed their presence and attempted attack. [item moved/cms/nd]
content.summary: I personally encountered 3 alien beings, did not see a ufo, but saw light coming from my livingroom and heard their voices but couldn't make out what they were saying.  they surrounded our bed, 8 of them, tall and evil presence and glowing white.

content.detailedDescription:
I watched the planes coming in to lax when i saw this orange orb.
at first i thought it was another plane but the orange color and no blinking lights made me think it wasn't. i had a tree branch as reference, so i could tell the orb was slowly moving up higher. the next second, it disappeared. and didn't reappear.
content.summary: Orange orb slowly ascending.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were driving leaving sanders county into lincoln county, montana. the sky was clear blue and the area very scenic. i decided to pull over to take a couple of photos. my son took pictures with his iphone. (the pictures i am submitting are from his iphone i had him email to me.) i had him save all photos prior to and after these submitted, to show that were no clouds before this photo, as they seemed to suddenly appear. we did not experience anything other than taking pictures and noticing something odd when we looked at them.  upon reviewing them and enlarging them, i noticed a few odd shapes and "cloud" formations. there is a long rectangular object, streaks of clouds that appear to have been sliced through in a downward motion, and another disk shaped object with a shiny top in the center that you can see more clearly on his phone. what's very odd is underneath that object there appears to be either numbers or letters made from "cloud" shapes. we both see the number 3 or the letter e a couple of times. there are also a couple of other "shapes" to the left and right of the two major objects i have written about.
content.summary: My son and i were taking scenic pictures of the mountains, there were no clouds, then there seemed to be.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving with my wife on january 24th in the afternoon. my wife was driving and i was in the passenger seat. the windows were down on the car and there was enough traffic we were going very slow. my wife wanted me to take a picture of some pretty clouds so she slowed down and threw her camera phone at me. she came nearly to a stop. maybe 5 miles per hour i leaned out the window and started shooting up. then i say from below a mist ball. i snapped a few of it too. it was a glowing orb that was ducking behind some trees but popped out and moved very quickly. it raced along side us as traffic started moving. i was looking everywhere for a reflection source or some way this was happening. i did not find one. we slowed again to stop at traffic, and it again slowed down but was moving through the trees for a moment more and was seemingly playing coy as i was trying to get a good look and pic. then it popped out and i got a full view. after i took a few shots it came right towards me and disappeared a few feet from the us. completely vanished.
content.summary: Approached by a misty glowey lighted orb that appeared to play peek a boo and was much smaller than i would have thought.

content.detailedDescription:
I drive a semi. my wife called me several times describing lights in the field across the street from our house. she said that one was orange and on the ground, one was white and was changing shape and hovering, two more came and left a few times like they were helping the one on the ground. she also said there were red lights on some of them. this event took place in rural mchenry county by hebron il. 
            as for myself, about 6 years ago i was on my way home from work and i saw a red light in the sky at about the same location. the light was about the size and intensity of a single semi trailer brake light is at about 200 yards. there was only a single light and as i drove nearer towards it i could see that the rise of the light per my distance and speed would have put the light to the west of my house by about 300 yards, and about 400 feet high from the ground. i glanced in my jeep to see if the light was a reflection from something in the jeep, there was nothing that would emit a light similar to that in the sky, i looked back up to see the light and it was gone. total duration of my experience was about 1 minuite.  when i went to work the next day, i described my experience with a coworker, then he described the same light in the sky that he saw about 20 years earlier in the same place from a different viewing place. whatever this (these) lights are, they reappear. 
           mchenry had an earthquake a few years ago and i watched the flashing earthquake lights for about 2 years.  the earthquake lights were like seeing the flash from a fire truck light bar from 2 miles and over a hill. these lights started out with just one here and there once and a while and escalated to the point that the whole southern horizon was constantly flashing every night as well as once in a while  i would receive a shock and see a bright flash of light, day or night, eyes open or closed would see these flashes. after the earthquake all the flashes and shocks stopped immediately.  what we have seen in the sky "ain't no quake lights"; been there, done that.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My wife called me several times describing strange lights in a tree farm field.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my boyfriend who noticed what he thought was a star. after looking at the light i realized it was changing colors from orange, red, and then green. it would hover a while then ascend in a bobble-like motion and descend in the same manner. i was stunned because i have never seen anything in the sky with that kind of movement. we watched it for about five minutes before i called my children outside to look at it. they observed the same thing that my boyfriend and i had observed. we watched about another five minutes then it started traveling farther away from us, still just above the tree tops until we couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: Just above treetops, ascended, hovered, and descended, then flew along a path away into the distance

content.detailedDescription: If you want to know more contact me.
content.summary: I've seen many strange things since i can remember. i'm 17 and i still see

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out to my small concrete backyard, and looked up to the stars as i usually did at night. there is a large view of the sky with the only interruption being the treetops i can see stretching out from the large trees in the front yard. i had turned off the backporch light as i stepped outside, for a better view of the sky. i looked straight up. approx 5 seconds after looking up i saw something in the corner of my right eye. both eyes immediately locked on a rectangular shaped object, black in color, with 2 smaller grey rectangles on each end, inside the large black one. it moved so smoothly. the object was silent and had no lights on. i couldn't tell if it was small and just above the tree line (approx 75 ft), and measured 8 ft. across, or if it was extremely high and very, very large. as it disappeared from view i  sidestepped to the left, into a planter box, to see if the object would appear on the other side of the branches. the object either disappeared, or, turned slightly to it's right and a new course would be out of my view. this was not one of those toys you can buy at radio shack, fly around an area and shine lights while sounding like a helicopter. i knew i had seen something really awesome, really amazing. i felt very lucky to have stepped out when i did. i didn't hear anything else about this from anyone or anything.
content.summary: Slow straight line, no sound, emission, or light. blk rectangle w/4 small rectangles, 2 on each end

content.detailedDescription:
I have been trying to find any sighting reported that met the discription of what i had witnessed (and filmed with my cell phone) the day of the full solar eclipse in portland, oregon 2012. 
5 of us were out in the back yard of a friend's house watching the eclipse. i had my phone filming the event. i looked over to the north and saw a black dot hovering in the sky, completely motionless, yet staying with the rotation of the globe. it was very far away (probably would've been over longview, washington u.S.A.). it looked as though someone would have taken a sharpie pen and made a dot in the sky.
i had not found anything until i watched your youtube video of the trip to mexico ([link moved to fi section/cms/tlg]). the footage displayed at 7:22 (time into the video) is the exact same object myself and 4 others witnessed.
unfortunately, i can no longer find the video i posted to youtube. i don't know if it was taken off or if it just ran it's course due to lack of interest from others....? 
i am writing this because i feel as though it should be documented in some way.
thank you, [name removed/cms/tg]]
content.summary: Stationary black dot that seemed to stay with the rotation of the globe.

content.detailedDescription: My brother was ice fishing at browns lake, salix iowa on march 6th 2015 around noon and decided to snap a photo of the geese flying about him and saw this image when viewing photo later.
content.summary: Please see attached photo - lower left and upper right images.

content.detailedDescription:
I'm an i.B.E.W. journeyman wireman commonly referred to as a traveler because i've worked all over the u.S.  in august of 2002 i took a call out of local 357 las vegas, to the nevada test site.  as interesting as this place was, it is not where the event happened.  my wife and i lived in pahrump, nv and had been visiting relatives in the s.F. bay area over new year holidays.  we were returning home on i-15 about to exit at baker,ca to get on death valley highway{127} taking the back way home to pahrump.  just as we were exiting, something came out of the upper atmosphere in a controlled descending arc from the south to the north.  it was dusk, almost dark, and this object and it's arc were of the color of a seasick green glow-stick.  it wasn't white and zippy fast like a shooting star.  i told my wife whatever it was, we were going to pass right by where it appeared to have landed. sure enough, about 15 minutes later, as we were headed north on 127, we could see that strange green color glowing from behind some foothills about 1/2 mile to the east of us.  i pulled over to the side of the road, stopped, got out of my suburban, and walked to the rear of the vehicle.  my 8-month old black lab, max, was barking and raising all kinds of hell in the rear of the vehicle, because he could see and possibly hear the object as well.  as for me, there was no sound that i could detect, possibly because of the distance involved. the object appeared to be hovering maybe 15-20 ft. above the ground, slowly moving forward in a northerly direction.  it would appear and disappear behind a series of foothills .  the phosphorous green glow was more apparent when the object was out of view behind a foothill.  when the object came back into view it appeared to be a disk shaped craft and if you drew a lateral line across the middle of it, the whole top half looked like a glass dome.  inside the dome were hundreds if not thousands of very tiny, multicolored lights.  reminded me of christmas tree lights, red, white, green, blinking very fast. i would guess the craft was 30-50ft. in diameter with no visible landing gear, and no external lights.  all the lights seemed to come from inside the dome, with the whole craft surrounded by that eerie green glow. i saw no occupants, and it never landed.  i viewed it for perhaps 3-5 minutes, and at my wife's insistence got back in my vehicle and drove away. i would guess that this occurred a few miles south of the dumont sand dune area on 127.  too bad i wasn't alone, or i would have went for a closer look.  no camera available, and no one else passed us by.  don't know why i waited so long to report this, but of all the ufo stuff i've seen on tv and elsewhere, i've never seen anything that remotely resembled this.  just wondering if you have.                                                                                                                               thank you,  
                                                       [item moved/cms/nd]
content.summary: Came out of upper atmosphere in a controlled descending arc.  not like a shooting star

content.detailedDescription:
1-sitting front porch
2 noticed because it entered my eyesight in front of my view
3 when first observed i did not know what it was, thought maybe a ghost of neighbor who just died. then thinking ufo
4 object was white like a white fluorescent light, not glowing and no trail
  of any kind, no rotating lights, just a white light. moving at high
  speed south to north, shaped like a football or slanted plate. then just
  disappeared, no fading or anything like that, just gone. could not 
  judge size or distance because it was in open space, from my point of
  view it was the size of a football.
5 thought this was unreal, once in a lifetime experience. i just set there
  in my rocker, finished my cigarette, smoked another. told my wife and 
  sort of felt stupid and she would think i was teasing.
6 lost sight when it vanished.
  
  tried to answer as in example , 1 thru 6, because i'm not great 
  at writing or story telling. just took this long, maybe like others,
  everyone thinking i am a fool, with word spreading around town,
  embarrassing my wife.
content.summary: White football shape moving south to north, fast

content.detailedDescription: I had just got up from sleeping to use the restroom at approximately 05:33 am est.  i then went to the living room to wake the dog up to go out.  my room was very dark with only a dim nightlight on.  at this point i happened to look up towards my front door which has a 1/2 circle window  near the top, and too, there's a small rectangular window just above the door. i couldn't help but notice a "brighter & larger than a star, red orb the size of a basket ball". the orb seemed to be hovering, completely still, and from my perspective, about 3 feet above the roof peek of my neighbor's house which is east of my house at a distance of approximately 300 feet.  there was absolutely no sound coming from the direction of this object. i quickly returned to my bedroom to get my glasses and then went right back to my living room. approximately 30 seconds later it started to move very slowly to the right. as soon as it started to move something blinked sequentially 3 times on the right side of the orb.  it continued moving to the right but as soon as the orb passed the tree-line i lost sight of it. as this event was transpiring i was very interested and not scared at all. i was so excited to be seeing something so abnormal and unusual. there is no way to know how long this object was there before first i noticed it and no way to exactly determine it's true distance and/or altitude.
content.summary: Star-bright red hovering orb.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my living room across the river in ottawa ontario from quebec watching tv at 7:30pm.  i have a huge picture window overlooking quebec and the river and out of the corner of my eye i saw something high in the sky over quebec in the northwest.  i turned my head to have a better look and it looked, at first, like a bright white star.  something about it was different though and then i realized that it was staying in place but it seemed to have movement.

i went over to the window to get a better look and it was then that i noticed it was moving in a sort of hyper way - flashing in this bright white light but around it were red lights too that throbbed and actually looked like they were circling the white object but on it - not separate from it.  also i noticed a couple of what i can only describe of arm like objects that seemed to appear at the sides of the object -right and left - and then they seemed to go back down then up or they could have been attached i don't know, too far away.  unfortunately i didn't have binoculars so specifics were limited.

i noticed that the object stayed where it was for almost an hour and then it started to move downwards a bit - almost like falling but slower and not too far down then it went back up to where it was and it kept doing this little bobbing kind of thing a few times.  now it was lower than when i first saw it.  all this time it was flashing and changing shape it seemed but since it was a star-like shape it was hard to see the shapes exactly but it grew then shrunk so i assumed it was changing shape in some manner.  the red lights continued to pulsate or spin around the white light.  the 'arms' would appear over and over but there weren't as many appearances of them as there was in the beginning.

this stage continued for a few minutes and then it started to come down a little more but still high above the horizon of quebec (gatineau) but this time it obviously was headed due north into quebec and it seemed to have turned a total red color - no sign of the white light now.  

i watched the red object continue north into quebec until it was just a little pinprick of red light and then it was gone - too small to see or maybe it disappeared - don't know.  that stage of it heading north and changing to just red lasted only about a half hour.

there was no sound from it at any time but i was far away but i didn't hear anything from where i was.

my feelings were several.  at first i was stunned to see it moving but then it was just very interesting, especially when i saw the red lights going around and the 'arms' jutting out from the sides of the white object.  the dipping up and down were actually kind of comical - almost like dancing or playing.  i wasn't scared because i had seen another sighting of 2 orange balls over pretty much the same area of quebec a couple of years ago and that sighting was even more spectacular than this one so i know something is going on over there in that general area so i guess that is why i wasn't shocked at this sighting.  i was really freaked out the first time a couple of years ago because that one was very dramatic with 2 of the objects shooting out actual beams that hit the ground in quebec and you could hear booms when they hit.  i had a witness with me at that time so she saw and heard that too.  i think i sent that report to mufon at that time, i think i did.

this incident was followed the next day march 6, 2015 about the same time of night by a sighting of a similar bright white light in the same area but it was definitely just a star because it did nothing and so i know that what i saw on the 5th was a ufo because it started out similar but changed immediately to much more.

that's about it.  i sent the report to ufo hunters as well for their info too in case they have similar sightings in their data bases too.

hope this helps with your sightings.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Bright starlike object high in sky over quebec canada that stayed stationary for about an hour but changed shapes and seemed to have red lights flashing around it.  also had what looked like 2 arms that came out of both sides now and then .

content.detailedDescription:
I was filming the sky using night vision at around 10pm on 23rd april, 2010. i noticed one object crossing the sky, possibly a satellite and flashed my green laser at it. it almost immediately lit up for about 1 second. then i noticed another object traveling the opposite direction, passing the first object. as a followed the object i flashed my laser at it a couple of times, but after around a minute or so it started to reduce speed significantly.

as i watched it reduce it's speed to a near standstill, i flashed my laser three times at it, within seconds of doing so the object started to light up very bright and remained like that for around 20 seconds. it then slowly reduced it's brightness and flew away. i then stopped filming. i was amazed by what i had just witnessed.
content.summary: Ufo comes to near standstill before giving off huge flash

content.detailedDescription: Driving into cranbrook where we lived we entered from lone pine road main entrance drove toward our homes on valley way we came around joanah pool heading toward the institute of science when we say an object ringed by multi colored lights with a green light on top and a red light on the under side. it moved west to east very low over the top of the observatory it stopped moved left then right up then down then proceeded south east until it got over the flag pole at kingswood school where it tilted to forty five degrees angle up and lifted off until it was out of sight all with no sound.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was twenty my friend bill price was with me.

content.detailedDescription:
I just wanted to add that my sighting on friday evening has left an indelible mark on my mind. i keep replaying it over and over in my mind trying to slow down, freeze frame and work it all out. it seems that the area where i grocery shop has high craft traffic. my impression of the craft and what may have been operating it favorable!! this is hard for me to type because of all the horrifying experiences my mother suffered through with what the greys did to her pretty much her entire childhood through her adult life until her death 12 years ago. 

but my impression of the craft and it's possible occupants was friendly even childlike!! the way the craft was moving in the sky was like it was up there simply enjoying the light from the setting sun. it was "playing" in the light! i was just the only person i know to have actually noticed it up there! it appeared as a plane without wings but had that triangle on the top of it like our regular planes do. then it kinda looked and moved like a bird with in depth banking and circling maneuvers. then when i hit a stage of acceptance that it was nothing conventional or biological that i was looking at it seemed to notice i was tracking it with my eyes. just when my mind was wrapped around the fact that omg this is really happening and it's really up there i need a better look at it let me pull out my phone it showed itself to me! it's triangular shape the three white bright unblinking lights on what i assumed was the bottom of it the craft was silver and transparent at the same time and i saw the haze around its entirety like some sort of invisible energy field that's my minds best guess. or else it was its "aura" because remember i see auras as a normal part of my hybrid existence! it seemed to be saying hi there human so you noticed us up here well take a gander and then it either blended itself back into the sky or popped out of this dimension because i did not see it speed off. 

from the nature of its actions my heart is telling me either it's another species of extra dimensional being or it was humans piloting that craft. whatever or whoever it was friendly, playful, loving the light of the sun, and my extra sensory perception tells me it was shocked to have been noticed but pleasantly surprised. i was never scared while watching it and it obviously could morph into other appearances from looking like a wingless 747 to a bird to what it presented to me. after this experience no i don't want to be taken in their craft or really ever meet them but i sensed good in it and that alone has my mind reeling!! because my previous impression based on my mother's experiences was nothing but hatred for them well the grey's specifically. 

now "knowing" that their are other explorers out there who are not interested in harming or scaring us my views are changing.

these other beings could be as vast and different from each other as we humans are from each other. perhaps the aggressive,  intrusive, harmful beings have their own agendas. then there are other beings who welcome our diversity and natural curiosity not with abduction and invasive actions to our persons but with a warm hello pleased to meet you and we see you as you see us!! so either explorers from somewhere else have seen me and now have a gentler impression of humanity too as i have a gentler view of them❤️ perhaps it really is one love throughout the universes!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It started out looking like a wingless 747 then changed shape to a large black bird and then into a triangle shaped silver and transparent craft. there were no windows seen.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my my aunt and uncles house my cousins lee and michelle and my sister were in the front yard i was laying on the grass looking straight up the sky was very clear i saw to bright white lights one stationary and one moving across the sky. from the one moving came a smaller red light that went over to the stationary light and the a few seconds later it returned to the moving light. i remember even at nine i thought it was most likely some high tech that was secret because i was way into all that i knew and could identify them all selfridge afb was only thirty miles to the east. my father was a law enforcement professional also an air raid warden and then fallout officer we retrieved a couple of weather balloons so i knew about things even then. ten years later i had a closer contact.
content.summary: 9 yrs old at cousins house looked straight up to see one white light stationary and one moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was letting the dog out around 8:30 pm when i noticed a bright "star" low on the horizon. i could see other stars but there was a haze so they were not as bright. i thought it might be mars. i kept watching it in relationship to the fixed lights on the horizon when i realized it was moving. i got a pair of high powered binoculars and then is when i could see it was glowed red on top and bottom with what looked like a pulsating brighter white light in the middle. it was quite far away so i could not make out any shape ( maybe diamond) but i thought the white light in the middle may be rotating which made it appear to pulsate. it must have been moving very slow because i observed it for about 15 minutes before it went below the horizon. i was very interested in the montana sighting because it seemed similar.
content.summary: Red and white pulsating lights

content.detailedDescription: The object appear at top of a hill, slightly higher than trees. after few minutes there is another object rising
content.summary: Bigger than start, smaller than moon

content.detailedDescription:
I waked out to walk the dog at 9pm in topanga.  i normally glance at the night sky.  i looked north towards the valley.  in the sky what i thought were stars seemed odd.  they were brighter than stars.  they were slowly moving around each other like bumper cars.  then slowly branched out into a ?...Literally lined up in that formation.  held that position maybe 1 minute.  the group then slowly broke apart and slowly grouped..And then headed south towards coast over topanga.   really really high.   airline path is directly below from lax.    these star like things bounce around in a group...Like birds swooping in and out...In all directions...  but would return to pod... it seem to vanish over the horizon but it vanished in a flash.
when i first saw it  i ran into get my wife so i wasnt the only one.  there were local teens hanging out near edleman park on near henry ridge at the time too.   tried to take video but couldn't pick objects up.  wife is totally stunned with what she saw too.  
so far i havent heard if anyone else saw the lights.   weird.
content.summary: 6 to 8 stars objects.  moving in interwine fashion.  made a ? shape. then slowly moved in group south. not in unison

content.detailedDescription:
We were going to kernersville. noticed the object on digital photo
a spot on the windshield.
 picture was shot through the windshield while auto was moving by spouse.
could not even see the object until photo
however spouse though that through lens of camera it was a water tower tank.
we went on to destination but on the way home i seen 'something' go across my 'line of vision' that was about treeline and moving very very fast as it was gone in a split second.
[going to try a shot with camera through windshield of car to see if anything looks like what the picture shows.]
content.summary: Black cloud like came out on picture taken of a power plant steam cloud

content.detailedDescription: A diagonal decent like it was a leaf falling from a tree then it made a wide turn under neath a orange start that was in its formation and vanished as the sun started rising!!???
content.summary: Looking south up at stars observed  what looked like a star wiggle around before making a

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my mom were out in the front of our house smoking a cigarette talking about work when she first noticed a strange light that seemed to jump straight forward before disappearing. i did not see this. about two minutes later, i walk out into the yard and was talking about something else and i saw a big red light appear out of nowhere. it dipped quickly down and then up again like a boomerang pattern before just disappearing . there were no trees or buildings blocking the sky--it just vanished.
i didn't know what to make of it when i first saw it. i have spent my entire life around air force bases and i can't say this is the first time we've experienced strange lights/object in the sky. at edwards afb, it was a weekly occurrence to see strange lights in the sky, though probably test aircraft.
i suppose my mother and i were just amazed and thought it was interesting.
content.summary: Extremely fast light appeared twice moving in a vertical boomerang pattern before disappearing

content.detailedDescription: I was at work, as usual. i looked out my window in my office which faces east-south-east and saw a bright star like object in the sky approximately 45 degrees up at at a far distance. it had no condensation trail like the high flying airplanes i typically see, nor was it one of the planes that land at lax regularly. they are quite large and distinguishable and always come in from the east and move west to land. lax is only a few miles from my office. the object moved from south to north, and was to the east at some distance, at least it seemed to be far away to me. i tracked it for a bit less than one minute. as it moved across the sky from south to east it abruptly disappeared. i looked for it for another good five minutes after this and could not find it again. about an hour later i went outside to have a cigarette and tried to see if i could find it again and could not see it. i guess it had gone. i see airplanes over my office and home all the time because they are both close to lax. and, every once in a while i see high flying jet liners flying over la to go somewhere else, but in those situations there are always condensation trails behind the aircraft. i am also an amateur military and civil aircraft spotter. this was definitely not a regular civil nor military aircraft. it showed up, moved very slowly across the sky, then disappeared. it was not the first sighting i have had at work in the last year. it made me feel as if it was trying to get my attention., like the last ones i have seen. i felt as if it was teasing me, as if it wanted me to see it, and then play "peek-a-boo" with me. it disturbed me, just as all my other sightings have.
content.summary: Daylight star moves across sky then suddenly disappears

content.detailedDescription: Was working in o`follin il . was breaking for lunch about 11 am to beat the rush at 12. got to the truck and turned around and seen this steel ball about 30 ft around coming from the north about 50 ft above the trees and went rite over the house behind the one i was working at. it was doing about 40 mph and heading toward scott afb. i could of shot it with my old m16 i had in the army with iron sites easily. blue skies no clouds. what made it even crazier was it was just serviced. 3 quarters of it was just wired wheeled. shiny. the lower left of it was still rusty. no noise ,no intake. then went out of sight to the south over the trees. i was in awe.
content.summary: Steel ball that just got seviced, went over the house behind the one i was working at.

content.detailedDescription:
This is my second sighting of a triangular object in this location.  this happened just a little bit ago, less than an hour. 

was taking dog out for restroom.  as i got across the street i was actually thinking about the last time i saw a triangular object fly straight over the top of me and so i looked up and to my surprise there was another triangular object moving straight over the top of me. this object was actually comprised of 8-10 smaller objects that looked like they had wings. they formed two lines making up the over all triangular shape. it moved from south to north at an incredibly fast speed. the whole duration was probably 5 - 6 seconds. yes, it was that quick. in the last couple of seconds it appeared to change to an odd # 4 shape.  there was literally no sound or exhaust whatsoever!  this was not a group of planes moving in formation! moving way too fast!!!! and zero sound!!

appeared metal
no lights
bounced city lights and moon light off it
was white-ish/gray or chrome like.

was very surprised to see it but excited that i did because it was much faster than my last experience!!!!
content.summary: Triangle object made of smaller winged objects moving fast south to north
